marklogic.body: Who cares, business owners should be able to offer whatever wages they want. But, if they want quality servers they know they will have to pay them more than $2.13. The government needs to figure out the difference between positive and negative freedoms and understand that negative freedoms Always trump positive freedoms.......we can't expect the government make the world a perfect place where everyone,Â "has the right"Â Cough Cough,Â to Â an education, healthcare, a job, a house and whatever else they could possibly desire......The only right that people have is the right to be left alone
